<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>0.0.1</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.datastructure" name="Data Structures" state="published" help="Data Structures" version="0.0.1" provider_name="ServiceNow">
<description> Provides element types: DataStructure and DataObject for flyweight data that can be stored internally as JSON and utilized via the DataStruture API. </description>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="DataObject" class="com.snc.datastructure.DataObject_JS" /> <extension point="com.glide.element" name="data_object" class="com.snc.datastructure.GlideElementDataObject" /> <extension point="com.glide.element" name="data_array" class="com.snc.datastructure.GlideElementDataArray" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="data_object" class="com.snc.datastructure.DataObjectTag" /> <extension point="com.glide.variable" name="ds__provider" class="com.snc.datastructure.DataStructureVariablesProvider" />
</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Provides element types: DataStructure and DataObject for flyweight data that can be stored internally as JSON and utilized via the DataStruture API.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Data Structures</help> <id>com.snc.datastructure</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Data Structures</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.datastructure/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires/> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.datastructure</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>0.0.1</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
